{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_M_FireBFG}} '''A_M_FireBFG'''
(no parameters)
Does nothing if the calling actor has no valid target. Otherwise, calls [[A_FaceTarget]], fires a {{Class|BFGBall}}, sets the calling actor's special1 field to current tic + 30, and sets its pain chance to 160. This replicates {{Class|BFG9000}} [[A_FireBFG|fire]]. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ScriptedMarine}} and derived classes.
